(fn take-up-to-nth--recur
  [n p coll] {:pre [(integer? n), (pos? n), (ifn? p)]}
  (loop [acc [], n n, coll coll]
    (cond
      ;; On each recursion, we generally include exactly 1 element that
      ;; satisfies p. (See the "(conj (into acc head) x)" line, later.) If coll
      ;; has fewer than n elements that satisfy p, we end up tacking on an
      ;; extraneous nil instead. In either case, this means we should drop the
      ;; last value of acc before returning it.
      (zero? n)      (butlast acc)
      (empty? coll)  (butlast acc)
      :else          (let [[head [x & tail]] (split-with (complement p) coll)]
                       (recur (conj (into acc head) x)
                              (dec n)
                              tail)))))

    (take-while (complement pred) coll)
    (let [[f & r] (drop-while pred coll)]
      (concat (take-while pred coll)
              [f]
              (gtw (dec n) pred r)))))

(fn [n predicate sequenze]
  (loop [acc [], ; result
         remainder sequenze, 
         cnt n]
    (let [matches (predicate (first remainder))]
    	(if (or (empty? remainder) (zero? cnt)) (butlast acc)
      		(recur 
             	(conj acc (first remainder)),
            	(rest remainder), 
             	(if matches (dec cnt) cnt)
)))))

;; TODO: I can eliminate res and hit-count by building with cons and decrementing n on each iteration
(fn tw
  ([n predicate xs] (tw n predicate xs '() 0))
  ([n predicate xs res hit-count]
   (cond (empty? xs) res
         (= n hit-count) (butlast res)
         :else (recur n
                      predicate
                      (rest xs)
                      (concat res (list (first xs)))
                      (if (predicate (first xs))
                        (inc hit-count)
                        hit-count)))))

(fn [n p xs]
  (loop [n n, [x & xs] xs, ys []]
    (cond
     (empty? xs) ys
     (and (p x) (= 1 n)) ys
     (p x) (recur (dec n) xs (conj ys x))
     :else (recur n xs (conj ys x)))))

(fn [n pred coll]
  (letfn [(pick [n pred [fst & rst :as coll] acc]
            (if (or (zero? n) (empty? coll))
              (pop acc)
              (if (pred fst)
                (recur (dec n) pred rst (conj acc fst))
                (recur n pred rst (conj acc fst)))))]
    (pick n pred coll [])))

(fn global-take-while
   ([n p s] (global-take-while n p s []))
   ([n p s result]
    (if (= n (count (filter p result))) (butlast result)

(fn [n p s]

    (let [current-element (first s)]
      (if (p current-element)

          accum

        (recur (rest s) cnt (conj accum current-element))))))

(fn take-while1 [n p coll]

      (cond
        (= t 0) (drop-last acc)
        (p (first coll1)) (recur (dec t) (rest coll1) (conj acc (first coll1)))
        :else  (recur t (rest coll1) (conj acc (first coll1))))))

(fn [n p xs] 
    (when (pos? n)
        (letfn [(generate [n xs] (lazy-seq
                    (when-let [[x & xs] (seq xs)]
                        (if (p x)
                            (when (> n 1)
                                (cons x (generate (dec n) xs)))
                            (cons x (generate n xs))

(fn f[l p [a & b]] (if (p a) (if (> l 1) (cons a (f (dec l) p b))) (cons a (f l p b))))

(fn f [n g s]
  (loop [n n s s result []]
    (if (= n 0 )
      (butlast result)
    (let [head (first s) ]
      (if (g head)
        (recur (- n 1) (rest s) (conj result head))
        (recur n (rest s)(conj result head))
        )))))

(fn global-take-while [n f s]
  (drop-last (:res (reduce #(if (= n (:curr %1))
                              %1
                              (if (f %2)
                                (assoc %1
                                  :curr (inc (:curr %1))
                                  :res (conj (:res %1) %2))
                                (assoc %1
                                  :res (conj (:res %1) %2))))
                           {:curr 0
                            :res  []} s))))

(fn global-take-while [n f coll]
  (let [first-ele (first coll)]
    (if (f first-ele)
      (if (> n 1)
        (cons first-ele (global-take-while (dec n) f (rest coll))))
      (cons first-ele (global-take-while n f (rest coll))))))

(fn take-while2
  ([n fun lis] (take-while2 n fun lis 0))
  ([n fun lis coun] 
   (if (or (= coun n) (= lis []))
     nil
     (if (fun (first lis))
       (if (< (inc coun) n)
         (lazy-seq (cons (first lis) (take-while2 n fun (rest lis) (inc coun))))
         nil)
       (lazy-seq (cons (first lis) (take-while2 n fun (rest lis) coun)))))))

(fn f
  ([n p s]
   (f n p s 0))
  ([n p s c]
   (if (p (first s))

             (lazy-seq (f n p (rest s) (inc c)))))
     (cons (first s)
           (lazy-seq (f n p (rest s) c))))))

          xs (rest coll)]

(fn [n f s]

      (if (< 0 n)

(fn me [n pre my-seq]
  (let [
         new-seq (map pre my-seq)
         r-fn (fn [res arg]
             (if (< (second res) n)
                (if (= (boolean arg) true) [(inc (first res)) (inc (second res))] [(inc (first res)) (second res)])
                res))
         res (reduce r-fn [0 0] new-seq)]
      (take (dec (first res)) my-seq)))

(fn [n p s]
    (loop [n n, s s, acc []]
      (let [[next-chunk rest-of-s] (split-with (complement p) s)]
        (if (zero? n) 
          (butlast acc)
          (recur (dec n) 
                 (rest rest-of-s) 
                 (concat acc next-chunk [(first rest-of-s)]))))))

(fn [n p coll]

        (take-while #(< (first %) n)
                    (iterate (fn [[i _ s]]
                               (let [next-val (first s)
                                     satisfies? (p next-val)

                                 [next-i next-val (rest s)]))
                             [0 nil coll])))))

(fn global-take-while [n pred coll]
  (loop [result []
         counter n
         xs coll]
    (if (and (> counter 0) (not(empty? xs)))
      (if (pred (first xs))
        (recur (conj result (first xs)) (dec counter) (rest xs))
        (recur (conj result (first xs)) counter (rest xs)))
      (vec (drop-last result)))))

(fn take-n-while [n pred coll]
  (if (< n 1) nil
    (lazy-seq
      (when-let [s (seq coll)]
        (let [[ret tail] (split-with (complement pred) s)]
          (if (or (= n 1) (empty? tail))
            ret
            (concat ret [(first tail)]
                    (take-n-while (dec n) pred (next tail)))))))))

(fn tw [n p s]
  (let [not-p (complement p)]
    (if (= n 1) (take-while not-p s) 
      (let [r (drop-while p s)]
        (concat

          [(first r)]
          (tw (- n 1) p (rest r)))))))

(fn [up-to pred coll]
  (letfn [(val-seq [up-to pred coll accepted]
           (lazy-seq (when-let [s (seq coll)]
                       (let [v        (first coll)
                             accepted (if (pred v) (inc accepted) accepted)]
                         (when (< accepted up-to)
                           (cons v
                                 (val-seq up-to pred (rest coll) accepted)))))))]
    (val-seq up-to pred coll 0)))

(fn ! [n p s]
  (do (println n)
    (println p)
    (println s)
  (if (= 1 n) (take-while #(not (p %)) s)
    (let [s1 (take-while p s)
          cs1 (count s1)
          rcs1 (if (> cs1 n) n cs1)
          rs1 (take rcs1 s1)
          s2 (take-while #(not (p %)) (drop (count rs1) s))
          sr (drop (+ (count rs1) (count s2)) s)
          tot (concat rs1 s2 (! (- n rcs1) p sr))]
      tot)))
)

  (let [red (next (reductions #(if (p %2) (inc %) %) 0 s))]
    (map first (take-while #(< (last %) n) (map vector s red)))))

(fn global-take-while [n p coll]
  (let [[x & xs] coll]
    (cond 
      (and (= 1 n) (p x)) '()
      (p x) (cons x (lazy-seq (global-take-while (dec n) p xs)))
      :else (cons x (lazy-seq (global-take-while n p xs))))))

(fn n-while [n f [x & r]]
  (lazy-seq
    (let [v (f x) 
          n (if v (dec n) n)]
      (when (and x (pos? n))
        (cons x (n-while n f r))))))

(fn take-while-nth [n p coll]
  (lazy-seq
    (when-let [s (seq coll)]
      (if (zero? (dec n))
        (when-not (p (first s))
          (cons (first s) (take-while-nth n p (rest s))))
        (cons (first s)
          (take-while-nth
            (if (p (first s)) (dec n) n)
            p (rest s)))))))

(fn foo [n pred coll]
  (lazy-seq
   (when-let [s (seq coll)]
     (when (> n 0)
       (if (and (= n 1) (pred (first s)))
         nil
         (cons (first s) (foo (if (pred (first s)) (- n 1) n)  
                                pred
                                (rest s))))))))

(fn gtw [n f [h & t]]
  (when-not (or (zero? n) (and (= n 1) (f h)))
    (cons h (gtw (if (f h) (dec n) n) f t))))

(fn f [n p [x & r]]
  (lazy-seq
    (if x
      (if (p x)
        (if (> n 1)
          (cons x (f (dec n) p r)))
        (cons x (f n p r))))))

(fn soln [n pred s]
  (let [[dont-match rem] (split-with (complement pred) s)]
    (if (seq dont-match)
      (concat dont-match (soln n pred rem))
      (if (> n 1)
        (concat (take 1 rem) (soln (dec n) pred (rest rem)))))))

(fn gtake-while [n p s]
  (lazy-seq 
   (if-let [v (first s)]
     (let [newn (if (p v) (dec n) n)]
       (when (not= newn 0)
         (cons v (gtake-while newn p (rest s))))))))

(fn gtw [n p xs]
  (lazy-seq
    (if (and (seq xs) (not (zero? n)))
      (let [fe (first xs)]
        (if (and (= n 1) (p fe))
          ()
          (cons fe (gtw (if (p fe) (dec n) n) p (rest xs)))))
      ())))

(fn gtw [n p xs]
  (let [[a r] (split-with (comp not p) xs)]
    (cond (not (empty? a)) (concat a (gtw n p r))
          (empty? xs) ()
          (< n 2) ()
          true (cons (first xs) (gtw (dec n) p (rest xs))))))

(fn [numb predfunc seqy]
  (loop [n numb, vect seqy, ans []]
    (if (= 0 n)
      ans
      (if (or (nil? (predfunc (first vect))) (false? (predfunc (first vect))))
        (recur n (rest vect) (conj ans (first vect)))
        (if (= (dec n) 0)
          (recur (dec n) (rest vect) ans)
          (recur (dec n) (rest vect) (conj ans (first vect))))))))

(fn glob-take-while [n pred [head & tail]]
    (when-not (or (zero? n)
                  (and (= n 1) (pred head)))
      (cons head (glob-take-while (if (pred head) (dec n) n) pred tail))))

(fn t [n p [x & xs]] 
  (if (p x)
    (if (= 1 n) '()
      (cons x (t (dec n) p xs)))
    (cons x (t n p xs))))

(fn take-while-n [n f xs]
     ((fn iter [ys c]
       (if-let [[y & resty] ys]
         (if (f y)
           (if (< c n) (cons y (iter resty (+ 1 c))) 
             nil)
           (cons y (iter resty c)))
          nil))
     xs 1))

(fn [n pred coll]
  (let [stop-word (nth (filterv pred coll) (dec n))]
    (take-while #(not= % stop-word) coll)))

(fn f [r x y z] (cond
                    (= x 0) (butlast r)
                    (y (first z)) (f (conj r (first z)) (dec x) y (next z) )
                    :else (f (conj r (first z)) x y (next z) )
                    )) []

(fn global-take-while [n pred coll]
  (lazy-seq
   (when-let [[head & tail] (seq coll)]
     (let [n-up (if (pred head) (dec n) n)]
       (when-not (zero? n-up)
         (cons head (global-take-while n-up pred tail)))))))

(fn global-take-while [n p xs]
  (letfn [(step [num-matched [x & more]]
            (let [new-num-matched (if (p x) (inc num-matched) num-matched)]
              (if (= new-num-matched n)
                nil
                (lazy-seq (cons x (step new-num-matched more))))))]
    (step 0 xs)))

(fn rec[n op l]
  (lazy-seq
   	(if (or (= n 0) (and (= n 1) (op (first l))))
      ()
      (let [f (first l)]
      	(cons f 
            (rec (if (op f) (dec n) n) op (rest l))
              )))))

(fn global-take-while [n p coll]
  (if (or (zero? n) (empty? coll))
    nil
    (let [[fst & rst] coll
          next-n (if (p fst) (dec n) n)]
      (if (zero? next-n)
        nil
        (cons fst (global-take-while next-n p rst))))))

(fn tw [n p s]
  (loop [n (dec n)
         [h & t] s
         acc []]
    (if (nil? h)
      acc
      (if (p h)
        (if (zero? n)
          acc
          (recur (dec n) t (conj acc h)))
        (recur n t (conj acc h))))))

(fn g [n f [h & t]]
  (lazy-seq
   (cond (and h (not (f h))) (cons h (g n f t))
         (and h (> n 1)) (cons h (g (- n 1) f t))
         1 [])))

(fn [n p coll]
  (let [k (atom 0)
        pred #(if-let [result (and (p %) (< (swap! k inc) n))]
               result
               (< @k n))]
    (take-while pred coll)))

(fn iter
  [n f [a & r]]
  (if (and (= n 1) (f a))
    []
    (lazy-seq (cons a (iter (if (f a) (dec n) n) f r)))))

(fn gtw [n p [h & t]]
    (let [n' (if (p h) (dec n) n)]
      (when (> n' 0)
        (cons h (lazy-seq (gtw n' p t))))))

(fn [n p s]
  (loop [n n
         s s
         acc []]
    (cond (empty? s) acc
          (= n 0) (drop-last acc)
          :else
            (let [[h & t] s]
              (recur (if (p h) (dec n) n) (vec t) (conj acc h))))))

(fn takex [n test seq]
  (lazy-seq
    (if (empty? seq)
      '()
      (let [hit? (test (first seq))]
        (cond
          (not hit?) (cons (first seq)
                       (takex n test (rest seq)))
          (= n 1) '()
          :default (cons (first seq)
                     (takex (dec n) test (rest seq))))))))

(fn take-nth-pred [n pred coll]
  (lazy-seq
    (when-let [c coll]
      (let [f (first coll) r (next coll) p (pred f)]
        (cond
          (and (= n 1) p) nil
          p (cons f (take-nth-pred (dec n) pred r))
          :else (cons f (take-nth-pred n pred r)))))))

(fn [n pred arg]
  (let [a (atom 0)]
    (take-while #(if (pred %) (if (>= (swap! a inc) n) false true)true) arg)))

(fn my-take
  [n pred xs]
  (if (or (<= n 0) (empty? xs))
    ()
    (let [h (first xs) b (pred h)]
      (if (and b (= n 1))
        ()
        (lazy-seq
         (cons h (my-take (if b (dec n) n) pred (rest xs))))))))
